__e: Husband Gerald and son Jonathan, eight, were downstairs.
Was Gerald's life shattered the day Claire died?
- Yeah, I'm thinking maybe Gerald's house is nicer than mine is.
Gerald must have spoken to a hundred people on Saturday, didn't you, darling?
After all this time, you still don't care what Gerald did to my sister.
He's known as, uh, Jerry or Gerald, 35, maybe 40 years old.
